attributes.action: make Phil Church's banter illegal and force Wagamama's to give away free Yaki Udon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is outrageus that Phil Church is allowed to continue to ruin the lives of those around him through the unfettered nonsense that comes out of his mouth.  And Yaki Udon should be free.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
